page.title: 09What are we concerned about?
page.content: Some people are concerned that the character of village life is being threatened by the wrong type of housing development.{New housing} {estates}in Fiskerton and Morton are thought to be out of keeping with surrounding properties. Children brought up in the area may have to leave to find a house they can afford. The amount of{heavy traffic}on narrow village roads affects the quality of life, causes deterioration of roads and is a hazard to pedestrians. There is concern over the possible future{withdrawal of bus and/or rail {services}as these are vital links for rural communities. {Dogs}barking and fouling both public and private areas are a continuing source of nuisance and concern. Many feel that stricter laws should be introduced to control this problem.
